column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////And while it may not appear so much on the surface
column2: please know that every single member of our staff at JINYA-Midtown works hard to keep the tables turning. As you might imagine
column4: considering that so many of our diners visit us with friends to not only share a meal
column7: and just have a good time. We explicitly train our staff to NOT RUSH PATRONS in any manner whatsoever
column9: it's challenging. But we try our best
column11: we work hard every single day.
